short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a tool to help predict student risk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Student At-Risk Predictor: Instantly identify students at risk of underperforming with real-time data from Canvas. Track grades, missing assignments, and performance insights, all in one place to support timely intervention. Install to help students succeed and improve academic outcomes!
